message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.HC, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses the differences between machine learning and human learning, and proposes a novel approach to understanding these differences through a class of learning tasks formulated as learning under rules. This topic falls under the broad category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), with a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and neural networks (cs.NE). The paper also touches on human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and natural language processing (cs.CL) in discussing the challenges of formulating rules for machines to learn from.
